replies.body:
anyways, i recommend

- Sword Art Online I and II (action, abit of romance, harem, for them gaming feelers)
- Date a Live I and II (alot of fanservice YESSS!)
- Akame Ga Kill (dark fantasy, action, abit of romance, somewhat harem)
- Nisekoi I and II (alot of fanservice YESSS!) (season 2 is ongoing in sub)
- Attack on Titan (action, dark fantasy i guess)
- Black Bullet (for those "I <3 Loli's")
- Tokyo Ghoul (horror but still great, if you can't stand alot of blood and cannibalism, watch the censored version)
- im not gonna put anymore cuz most of what was recommended by my friends at school were Hentai-Material, ecchi, yaoi, yuri, etc.

yeah, they kinda went overboard and just had it like Kirito-Asuna 24/7 from episode 8-14
and it made the 1st arc (sequence/ 1st half of a season) go way to fast, after the death of the Moonlit
Black Cats from June 2023, it skipped all the way to December 2023 which wasted alot of potential in
that time period, then came ALO which was actually pretty great, besides the fact that the antagonist
was full blown pervert-bastard and when Asuna got M*l***ed in ep 24, i just sat there and went like
"wtf did i just watch" and "was that really neccasary?"

replies.body:
Here are some recommended animes for you to take a look at. 

Sword Art Online- As stated before, yes this is a very overrated anime and imo its pretty bad (as in story plot wise) but other than that, it is a pretty enjoyable anime (depending on how you look on it)
Attack on Titan- Bit bloody and gorey but if oyur k with that, this anime is right for you. It is not overrated to an extent but its still pretty cool and enjoyable to watch. You might hate the main character and some characters are flat in the series but its great though. Another problem is there is a lot of plot holes (but reading the manga does fill up some plot holes but even the manga itself makes up more plot holes -_-)
FMA Brotherhood (Fullmetal Alchemist) - One of the classics and argueably the best animes. PRetty dope story plot and I guarantee you will enjoy this if your in to action
Nisekoi- Nisekoi is a romance/harem anime that it is a pretty enjoyable anime to watch. Very funny anime to watch but its plot kinda is bad because there is A LOT of fillers and the plot seems to get nowhere. Just a heads up
AngelBeats- Sort of overrated anime but Imo, its better than SAO. Pretty sad in the end and it is a shame it lasted 12 episodes but the plot is really good. ITs funny, theres action, feels, its a good starter anime imo. The only con i would give is the producers did not give as much episodes to futher develop their characters but pretty sick Anime
FairyTail- Kinda long anime series (and still airing) but Fairy Tail is a great anime. IT is very funny, the plot is REALLY good. (Yes a bit repeptitve but hey its like 200 ep long so what do you expect :/) and you may get feels even just by listening to the soundtrack. Also, there is barely any fillers in this anime so good to watch. If you want to watch a long term anime series, go watch Fairy Tail (and i Highly suggest you read the manga)

Animes to stay away from till you already watched enough- Now I know, some of these animes I would list would be arguable but i put these because some viewers may not understand or get lost.

Clannad- Clannad, IMO, is a very good anime, good romance and much feels (if your patient). I do not recommend this anime only if you do not want to watch long dialogues and you like face-paced shows
Daily Life of High School Boys- IT is a pretty hilarious anime as it shows a daily life of a high school boy. This anime is an iffy because if you were to watch this and this would be the first time watching anime , you  most likely get lost and not get the jokes
My Teen Romantic Comedy SNAFU- Good anime series but you might not get it. Idk its optional
Lucky Star- ^same reason stated above
Naruto- ITs your choice but it is REALLLY Long so watch it if your patient. Still good though.
One Piece- ^again
School Days- you will see why
Boko no Pico- STAY AWAY (but som r8's 11/10 4 dank memes) (also its a hentai)


That is my suggestions of some animes. Here is some additional websites to help you watch your anime series i guess :/


MyAnimeList: Keep track of animes and have some additional info on animes you watch: http://myanimelist.net/

Kissanime.com: Watch anime there- http://kissanime.com/

Hope I help
replies.body_tagged:
Here are some recommended animes for you to take a look at. 

Sword Art Online- As stated before, yes this is a very overrated anime and imo its pretty bad (as in story plot wise) but other than that, it is a pretty enjoyable anime (depending on how you look on it)
Attack on Titan- Bit bloody and gorey but if oyur k with that, this anime is right for you. It is not overrated to an extent but its still pretty cool and enjoyable to watch. You might hate the main character and some characters are flat in the series but its great though. Another problem is there is a lot of plot holes (but reading the manga does fill up some plot holes but even the manga itself makes up more plot holes -_-)
FMA Brotherhood (Fullmetal Alchemist) - One of the classics and argueably the best animes. PRetty dope story plot and I guarantee you will enjoy this if your in to action
Nisekoi- Nisekoi is a romance/harem anime that it is a pretty enjoyable anime to watch. Very funny anime to watch but its plot kinda is bad because there is A LOT of fillers and the plot seems to get nowhere. Just a heads up
AngelBeats- Sort of overrated anime but Imo, its better than SAO. Pretty sad in the end and it is a shame it lasted 12 episodes but the plot is really good. ITs funny, theres action, feels, its a good starter anime imo. The only con i would give is the producers did not give as much episodes to futher develop their characters but pretty sick Anime
FairyTail- Kinda long anime series (and still airing) but Fairy Tail is a great anime. IT is very funny, the plot is REALLY good. (Yes a bit repeptitve but hey its like 200 ep long so what do you expect :/) and you may get feels even just by listening to the soundtrack.
